biotools.summary: EzAAI is a pipeline for high throughput calculations of prokaryotic average amino acid identity. EzAAI is a suite of workflows for improved AAI calculation performance along with the novel module that provides hierarchical clustering analysis.

bioschemas.name: EzAAI
bioschemas.summary: EzAAI is a pipeline for high throughput calculations of prokaryotic average amino acid identity. EzAAI is a suite of workflows for improved AAI calculation performance along with the novel module that provides hierarchical clustering analysis.
